file.title: Text align

p.text: It defines a text position on the object (On left, On bottom, Centered).

p.textAll: All available positions are described in Quick fill words -> Alignments.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how a text can be positioned on the button
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Text align = Center Window1.Button1.Text align = "Bottom left" Window1.Button1.Text align = Window1.Button2.Image align Window1.Button1.Text align = Window1.Text1.Text
